snippet: Police officials say a teacher tackled a student just after gunshots were fired into the ceiling of a packed classroom at a high school in Normal, 135 miles southwest of Chicago.
abstract: Illinois police officials say a teacher tackled a student just after gunshots were fired into the ceiling of a packed classroom in a high school southwest of Chicago, and that a 14-year-old student is in custody.
lead_paragraph: Police officials say a teacher tackled a student just after gunshots were fired into the ceiling of a packed classroom at a high school in Normal, 135 miles southwest of Chicago.

headline.main: Illinois: Student Held After Firing Gun
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Student Held After Firing Gun
